Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.label: election
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.description: All adult, free, able-bodied citizens vote for candidates of their choice. When there are enough citizens, only two most popular candidates compete.
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.newLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} has been elected as the new {LEADERTITLE} of {NATIONNAME} with {VOTESNUM}. Vox populi, vox dei!
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.sameLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} has been reelected as the {LEADERTITLE} of {NATIONNAME} with {VOTESNUM}.

Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.label: lot
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.description: A random citizen is chosen to lead the nation.
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.newLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} drew the short straw and will rule {NATIONNAME} from now on!
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.sameLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} has a lucky hand! {PAWN_pronoun} won the {LEADERTITLE} lottery again.

Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.label: Seniority
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.description: The oldest citizen becomes the leader.
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.newLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} will rule {NATIONNAME} now as the oldest colonist.
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.sameLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} is still the oldest colonist in {NATIONNAME}. {PAWN_pronoun} remains our {LEADERTITLE}.

Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.label: nobility
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.description: The citizen with the highest, and oldest, nobility title is chosen.

Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.label: martial
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.description: Most accomplished warrior becomes the leader.
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.newLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} will now lead {NATIONNAME} to glory as its most renowned warrior.
Rimocracy.SuccessionDef.sameLeaderMessageText: {PAWN} is still the most able worrior of {NATIONNAME}. Friends and foes alike bow before {PAWN_objective}!
